original_text: The Lord spoke to Zechariah when Darius had been king for four years. It was the fourth day of the ninth month. The name of the month was Kislev.
korean_text: 다리오 왕 제사년 아홉째 달 곧 기슬래월 사일에 여호와의 말씀이 스가랴에게 임하니라

sentences.original_text: when Darius had been king for four years
sentences.korean_translation: 다리오 왕이 된 지 사 년째 되는 해였다

sentences.original_text: The name of the month was Kislev
